title: Escape Rooms

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to My Escape Rooms. This map features multiple rooms that you must escape from. It features puzzles and a little bit of parkour. I hope that you enjoy it!

title: CONFUSE DROPPER
briefDescription: The CONFUSE DROPPER map is a Minecraft Bedrock Realms minigame CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI. CONFUSE DROPPER is very similar to normal dropper maps but with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The CONFUSE DROPPER map is a Minecraft Bedrock Realms minigame CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI. CONFUSE DROPPER is very similar to normal dropper maps but with a small twist. All of the levels in this map are designed to make you confused as a player you have steer clear of the obstacles to get to the bottom. It has 10 fun and creative different levels that can be played by yourself or with your friends. Some levels were made easier and a mode was added to help most people who struggled with dropper maps.
CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI
This is a fun dropper map for 1.13 and all further versions
It has 10 fun and creative different levels.
If you decide to download this map and give it a try, good luck!
Rules:
? Render Distance 8+
? FoV: 75
? Don?t Cheat
? Made for 1-2 players
Updates:
? Updated to Minecraft 1.13.1.

title: Quartz Nether Fortress
briefDescription: Have you ever tried to Remodel a structure in minecraft but are to lazy? Well all hope is not lost as i have made a ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever tried to Remodel a structure in minecraft but are to lazy? Well all hope is not lost as i have made a nether fortress made of quartz instead of nether bricks for you guys to make a temple or home in.

title: Devergs? Flat Worlds: Templates
briefDescription: Hello to Devergs' Flat Worlds: Templates. After installing the pack with world templates, you can create any of 18 unique worlds! Some worlds have their own ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello to Devergs? Flat Worlds: Templates. After installing the pack with world templates, you can create any of 18 unique worlds! Some worlds have their own peculiarity, for example: the world of sponges can suck up all the water until the dry sponges run out. Also these are ordinary worlds like the bigger flat world. There are also worlds Redstone ready (V1-V3), ported from Java minecraft. Test everything yourself!
All worlds were made by Blocktopograph, you can download it below.

Bigger Flat World, Desert Flat World, Dirt Flat World, Leaves Flat World, Magma Flat World, Nether Flat World, Overworld Flat World, Packed Ice Flat World, Redstone ready (V1-V3), Snow Flat World, Sponge Flat World, Stone Flat World, Survival Flat World, Tnt Run Flat World (have error), Void Flat World, Water Flat World.
WARNING: DevergsMCBE didn?t mind that I would make a flat worlds version with a template function. See evidence.

This is map i made with my friend! We wanted to build modern parkour, so we made one. After 4 hours of work we made our map! It don?t have a lot of command blocks, but it is still fun!
We wanted to join fun with clear blocks, so we made this parkour! There can be bugs, so please don?t give us 1 star, but write down in commnets what should we change!
Here are some screenshots of map!

crawledImageUrls.text:
French Slap is a game like Cookie Slap; the goal is to knock all the players off the arena, last player alive wins, but this map is in a ?typically-French? theme!
French Slap is a game where the goal is to knock the players off the map. Last player alive wins! But this map is in a ?typically-French? theme/style, and with little twists!

title: Modern Mansion for Gamers!
briefDescription: Hi fellow gamers! Thanks for clicking on this map, made by me, DJMonkey101! Hope you all enjoy the serene pool and hot tub, 2 guest homes, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hi fellow gamers! Thanks for clicking on this map, made by me, DJMonkey101! Hope you all enjoy the serene pool and hot tub, 2 guest homes, massive treehouse, and much more!
I took about 2 months on this estate, so I hope you all enjoy it! Massive patios, Dolphin and Fish Aquarium, with a beehive on the second story. Strider farm brought to you from the nether, we have a nether portal surrounded in crying obsidian. On this world, if you go the right way, then there is also some pixel art I took some time to complete, so comment down below if you find it ?

title: Beta Title Screen World
briefDescription: Recently some people have found the seed to the title screen that started appearing in Beta 1.8 so I thought it would be awesome to bring ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Recently some people have found the seed to the title screen that started appearing in Beta 1.8 so I thought it would be awesome to bring it to bedrock. I slowly brought it up through the versions of Minecraft until I got to 1.16 and converted it to Bedrock
The Title Screen World in Beta 1.7.3

The Title Screen World in Bedrock 1.16
One thing I find really interesting is that the cloud pattern is the same in both the Beta pictures and in the Bedrock 1.16 Picture! Go See yourself! I also like how you can see the changes Minecraft has gone through through the years like biome colors and graphics.

title: Working Plague Inc. inside of Minecraft Bedrock
briefDescription: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play Plague inc. inside of Minecraft? Well, now you can experience just that! This map ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play Plague inc. inside of Minecraft? Well, now you can experience just that! This map is pretty much exactly like the game, complete with multiple upgrades as well as having to infect, and kill the human race
If you have never played the game, fear not because the map comes with a book that will teach you all you need to know about the game

title: Fantasy Village and Castle
briefDescription: This world is beautiful. A costal village surounded by fields and forest, a giant castle with beautiful roofs thats next to a massive forest, a ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This world is beautiful. A costal village surounded by fields and forest, a giant castle with beautiful roofs thats next to a massive forest, a tall wizardery tower? The amazing builds are paired with hyra shaders v3 and Better Foliage and Realistic Environment addon really make this map special.

title: Panoramic World
briefDescription: The Panoramic World for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.Nothing in the world has been touched and has cheats disabled, making it perfect for survival.The rest ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Panoramic World for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.
Nothing in the world has been touched and has cheats disabled, making it perfect for survival.
The rest of the world is a super flat. There is also a chunk of the world which is a mountain which has been split from its other halves
When you spawn into the world, you will spawn in a desert (image shown below), but if you look around will see a plains biome at the co-ordinates x:-22 y:64 x:27
If you turn 90 degrees (left) and walk straight you should run into this area (shown below) (stop at x:36 y:68 z:29)
Turn 90 degrees (left) again and eventually go up the hill ahead and you will see this area (shown below) (stop at x:40 y:73 z:-37)
Simply go to the other side (x:62 y:75 z:-71) and?

title: Beyond the Portal (Find the Button) [HUGE UPDATE!]
briefDescription: This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Buttonby alienboyThis is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Button
by alienboy
This is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether Update that launched earlier this June!

The map currently consists of 10 stages with a goal of 100 stages in it?s final update! But that as I?m sure you can guess is quite the distance away and will take a lot of work.
It?s because of this that any and all suggestions for stages are very much appreciated and any that make it into an update of this map will be credited so get commenting!
Updates will be frequent so stay tuned!
INTRODUCING: TROPHIES (WITH CUSTOM TEXTURES) and the OFFICIAL finished first 10 stage release!

Stages currently in-game include:
1. The Beginning of the End
2. Infected Forest
3. A Time Before Change
4. A Slow Souly Demise
5. The Not Cobble Nether Bridges
6. The Ne-end-er Glitch
7. Ancient Debris Mines
8. The Fungi Sanctuary
9. Basalt Delta Royalty
10. Strider Stables
With more coming very soon!
Should I make a guide video to this map?

title: PERFECT 0.1 ? (Shader Test & Showcase Map)
briefDescription: Hello, I'm RON. Do you want to test your shaders but you are too lazy to build a map to use? Just call me as ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello, I?m RON. Do you want to test your shaders but you are too lazy to build a map to use? Just call me as your hero! Let me introduce to you the PERFECT! A shader test and showcasing map.
I?m glad you came here, lol. This map includes light area. This place I called AREA01 or first area.
and the second area-plants area

This area includes all plants v1.16 (except berries, just accidentally slow down me all the time).
leaves,saplings,flowers,crops,undersea plants,coco,nether plants,grass blahblahblah
NEXT!
the third area-underwater caustic area
after that,the fourth area-shadow area
and the fifth area-the reflection area
and also sixth area-nether area
and the last one-cubemap area/sky test area

title: Horror Street 1.0
briefDescription: Enjoy the first update of horror street with Freddy Fazbears Pizza! Enjoy fully functional doors and lights! Roleplay with your friends and become killer animatronics ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Enjoy the first update of horror street with Freddy Fazbears Pizza! Enjoy fully functional doors and lights! Roleplay with your friends and become killer animatronics to take down the night-guard, or just enjoy the building!

In this world that was made by one person, me, you can enjoy what kids used to enjoy in 1989! This is known as Freddy Fazbear?s pizza. This is the first production of what will turn into many different horror games converted into minecraft. This one street will include many more maps, such as Slenderman, Siren Head, BATIM, and more!
I have built the whole building by myself, in the time span of over 24 hours. This is my first build and I am planning to do more builds and amusement parks and whatnot.
